response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to you, and I believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. I am offering this remarkable asset to you at a special price of $1,300,000, which I trust will be appealing and fair.

Please consider this offer carefully, and let me know if you have any questions or require additional information about the product. I am here to assist you throughout the process and ensure a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1300000}
